首.definition: head; chief; first (occasion, thing etc); classifier for poems, songs etc

首任.definition: first person to be appointed to a post

首先.definition: first (of all); in the first place

首創.definition: to originate; to pioneer; to invent

首善之區.definition: (idiom) the finest place in the nation (often used in reference to the capital city)

首善之地.definition: see 首善之區|首善之区[shou3shan4 zhi1 qu1]

首家.definition: first (hotel of its type, store of its type etc)

首尾相接.definition: to join head to tail; bumper-to-bumper (of traffic jam)

首屈一指.definition: to count as number one (idiom); second to none; outstanding

首府.definition: capital city of an autonomous region

首推.definition: to regard as the foremost; to name as a prime example; to implement for the first time

首映.definition: to premiere (a movie or TV show); premiere (of a movie); first-run (movie); to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)

首次.definition: first; first time; for the first time

首次公開招股.pinyin: shou3 ci4 gong1 kai1 zhao1 gu3

首次注視時間.pinyin: shou3 ci4 zhu4 shi4 shi2 jian1

首款.definition: to confess one's crime; first model, version, kind etc (of gadgets, software, cars etc)

首演.definition: maiden stage role; first performance; first public showing

首爾.definition: Seoul, capital of South Korea (Chinese name adopted in 2005 to replace 漢城|汉城[Han4 cheng2])

首爾國立大學.pinyin: Shou3 er3 Guo2 li4 Da4 xue2
首爾國立大學.definition: Seoul National University (SNU or Seoul National), Korea

首爾特別市.definition: Seoul Special Metropolitan City, official name of the capital of South Korea

首相.definition: prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)

首縣.definition: principal county magistrate in imperial China

首肯.definition: to give a nod of approval

首腦會談.definition: summit talks; discussion between heads of state

首要.definition: the most important; of chief importance

首辦.definition: first organized; to run sth for the first time

首選.definition: first choice; premium; to come first in the imperial examinations

首都國際機場.pinyin: Shou3 du1 Guo2 ji4 Ji1 chang3

首都經濟貿易大學.pinyin: Shou3 du1 Jing1 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Da4 xue2
首都經濟貿易大學.definition: Capital University of Economics and Business (Beijing)

首都經貿大學.pinyin: Shou3 du1 Jing1 mao4 Da4 xue2
首都經貿大學.definition: Capital University of Business and Economics, Beijing

首都領地.definition: capital territory; Australian Capital Territory (ACT) around Canberra 堪培拉

首重.definition: to emphasize; to give the most weight to; to rank first

首頁.definition: home page (of a website); title page; front page; first page; fig. beginning; cover letter
